TopicTitle: Control From Here (controlling another craft from current view)

Articles.Content:
This may be completely useless, and maybe it is already possible, but I originally thought control from here meant you control that craft from the present view - without switching crafts with bracket.

What if this were possible? The view doesn't change, but the nav-ball and everything realigns with the selected craft. Might be useless since switching with a bracket is so simple and quick but could help with pulling away satellites and other detached craft.

No only no, but oh hell no.

Last thing I need to have happen is think I'm controlling one ship, fire up the engines, and watch everything asplode.
